# gcore_region (Data Source)

Represent region data

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider gcore {
  user_name = "test"
  password = "test"


}

data "gcore_region" "rg" {
  name = "ED-10 Preprod"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Displayed region name

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
